html: Monument
name: Monument
text:
Claim this special achievement immediately if you tuck six cards or score six cards during a single turn.

(May also be claimed via Masonry, from Age 1.

html: Empire
name: Empire
text:
Claim this special achievement immediately if you have three or more icons of all six types:

(May also be claimed via Construction, from Age 2.

html: World
name: World
text:
Claim this special achievement immediately if you have twelve or more on your board.

May also be claimed via Translation, from Age 3.

html: Wonder
name: Wonder
text:
Claim this special achievement immediately if you have five colors on your board, and each is splayed either up or right.

(May also be claimed via Invention, from Age 4.)

html: Universe
name: Universe
text:
Claim this special achievement immediately if you have five top cards, and each is of value 8 or higher.

(May also be claimed via Astronomy, from Age 5.

dogmas: : You may return a card from your hand. If you do, draw and score a card of value one higher than the card you returned.
html: Agriculture1
name: Agriculture

dogmas: : I demand you draw a 1, then transfer the highest card in your hand to my hand!
html: Archery1
name: Archery

dogmas: : Meld a card from your hand of different color from any card on your board.
: Draw and score a 1 for each color present on your board not present on any other player's board.
html: Clothing1
name: Clothing

dogmas: : You may tuck a card from your hand of the same color as any card on your board. If you do, you may splay that color of your cards left.
html: Code of Laws1
name: Code of Laws

dogmas: : I demand you transfer a top card with a from your board to my board if you have at least four on your board! If you do, draw a 1!
html: City States1
name: City States

dogmas: : Meld the lowest card in your hand. Draw a 1.
html: Domestication1
name: Domestication

dogmas: : You may meld any number of cards from your hand, each with a . If you melded four or more cards, claim the Monument achievement.
html: Masonry1
name: Masonry

dogmas: : Draw and reveal a 1. If it has a , score it and repeat this dogma effect. Otherwise, keep it.
html: Metalworking1
name: Metalworking

dogmas: : Draw a 1. If it is the same color as any card on your board, meld it and draw a 1.
html: Mysticism1
name: Mysticism

dogmas: : I demand you transfer a card with a from your hand to my score pile! If you do, draw a 1.
: If no cards were transferred due to this demand, draw a 1.
html: Oars1
name: Oars

dogmas: : You may return up to three cards from your hand. If you returned any cards, draw and score a card of value equal to the number of cards you returned.
: Draw a 1.
html: Pottery1
name: Pottery

dogmas: : Draw and meld a 1.
html: Sailing1
name: Sailing

dogmas: : Draw two 1.
html: The Wheel1
name: The Wheel

dogmas: : You may return three cards from your hand. If you do, draw and meld a 3.
: You may return a 3 from your hand. If you do, draw three 1.
html: Tools1
name: Tools

dogmas: : Draw a 2.
html: Writing1
name: Writing

dogmas: : If you have more cards in your score pile than in your hand, draw two 3.
html: Calendar2
name: Calendar

dogmas: : You may exchange all the highest cards in your hand with all the highest cards in your score pile.
html: Canal Building2
name: Canal Building

dogmas: : You may return any number of cards from your hand. If you do, draw and score a 2 for every different value of card you returned.
html: Currency2
name: Currency

dogmas: : I demand you transfer two cards from your hand to my hand, then draw a 2!
: If you are the only player with five top cards, claim the Empire achievement.
html: Construction2
name: Construction

dogmas: : Draw a 2 for every two icons on your board.
html: Fermenting2
name: Fermenting

dogmas: : I demand you transfer a 1 from your score pile to my score pile.
: If any card was transferred due to the demand, draw and score a 1.
html: Mapmaking2
name: Mapmaking

dogmas: : You may return a card from your hand. If you do, draw and meld a card of value one higher than the card you returned.
html: Mathematics2
name: Mathematics

dogmas: : I demand you transfer a top card on your board of a different color from any card on my board to my score pile! If you do, draw and tuck a 1!
: Draw and tuck a 1.
html: Monotheism2
name: Monotheism

dogmas: : You may splay left any one color of your cards.
: You may score a card from your hand.
html: Philosophy2
name: Philosophy

dogmas: : Meld one or two cards from your hand. If you melded two, you may transfer your top red card to another player's board. In exchange, transfer that player's top green card to your board.
html: Road Building2
name: Road Building

dogmas: : Draw and reveal a 4 for every 3 icons on your board. If any of the drawn cards are red, return the cards drawn and all cards in your hand. Otherwise, keep them.
: Meld a card from your hand, then score a card from your hand.
html: Alchemy3
name: Alchemy

dogmas: : You may return the highest card from your score pile. If you do, draw a card of value two higher than the highest card remaining in your score pile.
html: Education3
name: Education

dogmas: : I demand you transfer a top non-green card with a from your board to my board, and then transfer a top card without a from my board to your board.
html: Compass3
name: Compass

dogmas: : I demand you transfer all top cards with a from your board to my score pile!
: You may splay your red cards left.
html: Engineering3
name: Engineering

dogmas: : I demand you transfer a card with a from your hand to my hand!
: You may splay your yellow or purple cards left.
html: Feudalism3
name: Feudalism

dogmas: : I demand you exchange all cards in your hand with all the highest cards in my hand!
: Score a card from your hand with a . You may splay your red cards left.
html: Machinery3
name: Machinery

dogmas: : I demand you exchange the highest card in your score pile with the lowest card in my score pile.
html: Medicine3
name: Medicine

dogmas: : Draw and meld a 3. If it has a , draw and score a 4. Otherwise, transfer a card from your score pile to the score pile of an opponent with fewer points than you.
html: Optics3
name: Optics

dogmas: : You may splay your green or blue cards left.
: Draw a 4 for every color you have splayed left.
html: Paper3
name: Paper

dogmas: : You may meld all the cards in your score pile. If you meld one, you must meld them all.
: If each top card on your board has a , claim the World achievement.
html: Translation3
name: Translation

dogmas: : I demand you return a card from your score pile! If you do, return a top card of equal value from your board!
html: Anatomy4
name: Anatomy

dogmas: : Draw and tuck a 3. If it has a , repeat this dogma effect.
html: Colonialism4
name: Colonialism

dogmas: : I demand you transfer a top non-purple card with a from your board to my board! If you do, draw and meld a 4!
: You may splay your green cards right.
html: Enterprise4
name: Enterprise

dogmas: : Draw and meld a 5.
html: Experimentation4
name: Experimentation

dogmas: : I demand you transfer a top card with a from your board to my score pile!
: If any card was transferred due to the demand, draw and score a 2.
html: Gunpowder4
name: Gunpowder

dogmas: : You may splay right any one color of your cards currently splayed left. If you do, draw and score a 4.
: If you have five colors splayed, each in any direction, claim the Wonder achievement.
html: Invention4
name: Invention

dogmas: : I demand you transfer a 2 or 3 from your score pile to my score pile!
html: Navigation4
name: Navigation

dogmas: : You may return a card from your hand. If you do, score a card from your hand for every two icons on your board.
html: Perspective4
name: Perspective

dogmas: : You may return a card from your score pile. If you do, draw a card of value two higher than the top purple card on your board.
: You may splay your blue cards right.
html: Printing Press4
name: Printing Press

dogmas: : You may tuck a card from your hand for every two icons on your board.
: You may splay your yellow or purple cards right.
html: Reformation4
name: Reformation

dogmas: : Draw and reveal a 6. If the card is green or blue, meld it and repeat this dogma effect.
: If all non-purple top cards on your board are value 6 or higher, claim the Universe achievement.
html: Astronomy5
name: Astronomy

dogmas: : I demand you transfer a top non-green card with a from your board to my board! If you do, draw and score a 5.
: You may splay your green cards right.
html: Banking5
name: Banking

dogmas: : You may splay your blue cards right.
: Draw and score a card of value one higher than the highest top card on your board and then return a card from your score pile.
html: Chemistry5
name: Chemistry

dogmas: : Draw and tuck a 5.
: You may splay your red cards right.
: You may score any one of your top cards. If you do, also score the card beneath it.
html: Coal5
name: Coal

dogmas: : You may return a card from your hand. If you do, splay any one color of your cards right, and draw a card of value equal to the number of cards of that color on your board.
html: Measurement5
name: Measurement

dogmas: : Draw three 6 and reveal them. If two or more of the drawn cards are of the same color, return the drawn cards and all the cards in your hand. Otherwise, keep them.
html: Physics5
name: Physics

dogmas: : I demand you transfer a top non-purple card with a from your board to my board! If you do, draw a 5!
html: Societies5
name: Societies

dogmas: : I demand you transfer the highest card in your score pile to your hand! If you do, and have only one card in your hand afterwards, repeat this demand!
: You may splay your yellow cards right.
html: Statistics5
name: Statistics

dogmas: : Draw and tuck two 4, then score your bottom yellow card.
html: Steam Engine5
name: Steam Engine

dogmas: : I demand you transfer two cards of value 4 or less from your score pile to my score pile!
: If any card was transferred due to the demand, score the lowest top card with a from your board.
html: The Pirate Code5
name: The Pirate Code

dogmas: : You may splay your blue cards right.
: Draw and meld a 7.
html: Atomic Theory6
name: Atomic Theory

dogmas: : You may draw and tuck a 6. If you do, score all your top cards without a .
: You may splay your yellow cards right.
html: Canning6
name: Canning

dogmas: : Reveal the color of a card from your hand. Take into your hand all cards of that color from all other players' hands. Then, meld all cards of that color from your hand.
html: Classification6
name: Classification

dogmas: : You may return any number of cards from your hand. If you have returned more cards than any other player due to Democracy this phase, draw and score an 8.
html: Democracy6
name: Democracy

dogmas: : I demand you transfer a card from your hand to my score pile! If you do, draw a 6!
: You may splay your red or purple cards right.
html: Emancipation6
name: Emancipation

dogmas: : You may meld all the highest cards in your score pile. If you meld one of the highest, you must meld all of the highest.
html: Encyclopedia6
name: Encyclopedia

dogmas: : Draw and tuck a 6 for every two icons on your board.
: You may splay your red or purple cards right.
html: Industrialization6
name: Industrialization

dogmas: : Draw and score a card of value equal to the highest card in your score pile.
html: Machine Tools6
name: Machine Tools

dogmas: : If your green cards are splayed right, you may splay any color of your cards right.
: You may splay your green cards right.
html: Metric System6
name: Metric System

dogmas: : I demand you return all the lowest cards in your score pile! If you returned any, draw and meld a 6!
: If any card was returned as a result of the demand, draw and meld a 7.
html: Vaccination6
name: Vaccination

dogmas: : You may exchange all the cards in your hand with all the cards in your score pile. If you exchange one, you must exchange them all.
html: Bicycle7
name: Bicycle

dogmas: : I demand you transfer two cards from your score pile to my score pile!
html: Combustion7
name: Combustion

dogmas: : Return all your top cards without a , then draw an 8 for each card you returned.
html: Electricity7
name: Electricity

dogmas: : You may choose to either draw and score an 8 and then return a card from your score pile, or draw a card of value one higher than the highest card in your score pile.
html: Evolution7
name: Evolution

dogmas: : I demand you transfer your three highest cards from your hand to my hand! If you do, and then have no cards in hand, draw a 7!
html: Explosives7
name: Explosives

dogmas: : You may tuck up to three cards from your hand. If you do, draw and score a 7 for every different value of card you tucked.
html: Lighting7
name: Lighting

dogmas: : You may rearrange the order of one color of cards on your board.
: You may splay your yellow or blue cards up.
html: Publications7
name: Publications

dogmas: : Return all cards from your hand, then draw three 6.
: You may splay up any one color of your cards currently splayed right.
html: Railroad7
name: Railroad

dogmas: : I demand you return half (rounded down) of the cards in your hand.
: You may score a card from your hand.
html: Refrigeration7
name: Refrigeration

dogmas: : I demand you exchange the two highest cards in your hand with the lowest card in my hand!
html: Sanitation7
name: Sanitation

dogmas: : You may return up to three cards from your hand. For every different value of card that you returned, draw two 8.
html: Antibiotics8
name: Antibiotics

dogmas: : I demand you transfer a top non-green card with a from your board to my score pile! If you do, draw and meld an 8!
: Draw and meld an 8.
html: Corporations8
name: Corporations

dogmas: : Choose two colors, then draw and reveal a 9. If it is either of the colors you chose, meld it and you may splay your cards of that color up.
: If you have twenty or more icons on your board, you win.
html: Empiricism8
name: Empiricism

dogmas: : If your red cards are splayed up, you may splay any color of your cards up.
: You may splay your red cards up.
html: Flight8
name: Flight

dogmas: : You may return a card from your hand. If you do, choose a value, and return all cards of that value from all score piles.
: You may splay your purple cards up.
html: Mass Media8
name: Mass Media

dogmas: : I demand you transfer your two highest non-red cards without a from your board to my score pile! If you transferred any cards, draw an 8!
html: Mobility8
name: Mobility

dogmas: : You may return up to two cards from your hand. If you return two, draw a 10 and then draw and score a 10.
html: Quantum Theory8
name: Quantum Theory

dogmas: : Return a card in any other player's score pile for every two icons on your board.
html: Rocketry8
name: Rocketry

dogmas: : I demand you transfer a top non-yellow card with a from your board to my board! If you do, score the card beneath it, and return all other cards from that pile!
html: Skyscrapers8
name: Skyscrapers

dogmas: : You may tuck all cards from your hand. If you tuck one, you must tuck them all. If you tucked at least one purple card, take all the lowest cards in each other player's hand into your hand.
html: Socialism8
name: Socialism

dogmas: : I demand you draw two 9 and reveal them. Transfer the card of my choice to my board, and meld the other.
: If you have ten or more green cards on your board, you win.
html: Collaboration9
name: Collaboration

dogmas: : I demand you transfer all but one card from your hand to my hand! Also, transfer the highest card from your score pile to my score pile!
html: Composites9
name: Composites

dogmas: : You may splay your red cards or your green cards up.
: Draw and meld a 10, then execute its non-demand dogma effects for yourself only.
html: Computers9
name: Computers

dogmas: : You may return a card from your hand. If you do, score a card from your hand and draw two 10.
html: Ecology9
name: Ecology

dogmas: : I demand you draw a 10! If it is red, remove all hands, boards, and score piles from the game! If this occurs, the dogma action is complete.
: Return a top card other than Fission from any player's board.
html: Fission9
name: Fission

dogmas: : Draw and meld a 10. Score all cards beneath it.
html: Genetics9
name: Genetics

dogmas: : Return all cards from your hand, and draw three 8.
: You may splay your purple cards up.
: Meld a card from your hand and then execute each of its non-demand dogma effects for yourself only.
html: Satellites9
name: Satellites

dogmas: : I demand you transfer all the highest cards from your score pile to my hand! If you transferred any cards, then transfer a top card from my board without a to your hand!
html: Services9
name: Services

dogmas: : Reveal a card from your hand. Take into your hand the top card of that color from all other players' boards.
: You may splay your yellow or blue cards up.
html: Specialization9
name: Specialization

dogmas: : You may tuck any number of cards from your hand. Draw and score a 1 for each card you tucked.
html: Suburbia9
name: Suburbia

dogmas: : Draw and score a 10.
: If Robotics and Software are top cards on any board, the single player with the lowest score wins.
html: A.I.10
name: A.I.

dogmas: : Transfer a top card with a from any other player's board to your score pile.
: If any player has fewer than three icons on their board, the single player with the most icons on their board wins.
html: Bioengineering10
name: Bioengineering

dogmas: : I demand you return half (rounded up) of the cards in your score pile!
html: Databases10
name: Databases

dogmas: : I demand you return a top card with a on your board!
: Draw and score a 6. If no player has more icons than icons on their board, the single player with the most points wins.
html: Globalization10
name: Globalization

dogmas: : You may return a card from your hand. If you returned a 10, draw a 10 for every different value of card in your score pile.
html: Miniaturization10
name: Miniaturization

dogmas: : Score your top green card. Draw and meld a 10, then execute its non-demand dogma effects for yourself only.
html: Robotics10
name: Robotics

dogmas: : Execute the non-demand dogma effects of any other top card on your board for yourself only.
: If you have more achievements than each other player, you win.
html: Self Service10
name: Self Service

dogmas: : Draw and score a 10.
: Draw and meld two 10, then execute the second card's non-demand dogma effects for yourself only.
html: Software10
name: Software

dogmas: : You may score all cards from your hand. If you score one, you must score them all.
html: Stem Cells10
name: Stem Cells

dogmas: : You may splay your green cards up.
: Draw and score a 10.
: Draw and meld a 10 for every two icons on your board.
html: The Internet10
name: The Internet

html: Supremacy
name: Supremacy
text:
Claim this special achievement immediately if you have three icons or more of the same icon type visible in each of four different colors. (Each color has to have the same icon as the other colors.)

(May also be claimed via Novel, from Age 3.)

html: Destiny
name: Destiny
text:
Claim this special achievement immediately if you have seven or more cards in your forecast.

(May also be claimed via Barometer, from Age 4.)

html: Wealth
name: Wealth
text:
Claim this special achievement immediately if you have eight bonuses visible on your board.

(May also be claimed via Palampore, from Age 5.)

html: Heritage
name: Heritage
text:
Claim this special achievement immediately if you have eight visible in one color.

(May also be claimed via Loom, from Age 6.)

html: History
name: History
text:
Claim this special achievement immediately if you have a color with four visible echo effects.

(May also be claimed via Photography, from Age 7.)

echoes: Tuck a red card from your hand.

echoes: You may score a card from your hand.

echoes: If every other player has a higher score than you, draw a 3.

: Draw a 1. If the card has a bonus, reveal it and then repeat this dogma effect.
echoes: You may splay one color of your cards left.

name: Flute

echoes: You may meld a card from your hand.

echoes: Score a card with a bonus from your hand.

echoes: Draw a 3 OR Draw and foreshadow a 4.

name: Pagoda

: If Paper is a top card on any player's board, transfer it to your score pile.
echoes: Take a bottom card from your board into your hand.

name: Scissors

dogmas: : You may splay any one color of your cards left.
: If the 2 deck has at least one card, you may transfer its bottom card to the available achievements.
echoes: Tuck all cards of one value from your hand.

echoes: Draw and meld a 3.

: You may splay your red or green cards left.

name: Homing Pigeons

name: Katana

name: Liquid Fire

dogmas: : You may return three cards of equal value from your hand. If you do, draw a card of value two higher than the cards you returned.

dogmas: : Draw a 3. You may splay your purple cards left.
: If all your non-purple top cards share a common icon other than , claim the Supremacy achievement.

echoes: Score a card from your hand of a color you have splayed.

name: Sunglasses

dogmas: : Draw and foreshadow a card of value two higher than a bonus on your board.
: If you have five or more cards in your forecast, claim the Destiny achievement.

dogmas: : Draw a 4.
: If you have exactly one card in your hand, draw a 4, then draw and score a 4.

dogmas: : I demand you draw and reveal three 10, total the number of on them, and then return them! Transfer all cards of that value from your hand and score pile to my score pile!

dogmas: : You may return up to three cards from your hand. For each card returned, you may splay one of your colors left. If you return at least two, draw and foreshadow a 6.

dogmas: : I demand you return all your top cards with ! Draw and tuck a 4!
: For every two cards returned as a result of the demand, draw and tuck a 4.
echoes: Splay left one color on any player's board.

name: Kobukson

dogmas: : You may return up to three cards from your hand. If you do, draw that many cards of value one higher than the highest card you returned. Foreshadow one of them, and return the rest of the drawn cards.
echoes: Draw a 5.
html: Pencil4
name: Pencil

dogmas: : I demand you transfer a top non-red card with a or from your board to my board! If you do, draw a 4!
: You may splay your purple cards right.
html: Shuriken4
name: Shuriken

dogmas: : You may splay your yellow cards right.
: Draw a card of value equal to the value of your lowest top card plus the number of colors you have splayed.
html: Slide Rule4
name: Slide Rule

dogmas: : You may place a card from your forecast on top of its deck. If you do, achieve a card from your forecast if you meet the requirements to do so.
echoes: Draw and foreshadow a 5.
html: Telescope4
name: Telescope

dogmas: : I demand you return all cards from your score pile matching the highest bonus on my board.
: You may return a card in your hand and draw a card of the same value.
echoes: Draw and tuck a 4.
html: Toilet4
name: Toilet

dogmas: : Draw and reveal a 6. If it has a , meld it and repeat this dogma effect, otherwise, foreshadow it.
echoes: Draw and tuck a 4.
html: Coke5
name: Coke

dogmas: : I demand you draw and tuck a 5! Return your top card of the tucked card's color!
: Draw and tuck a 5. You may return a top card from your board.
echoes: Draw and tuck a 5.
html: Lightning Rod5
name: Lightning Rod

dogmas: : I demand you transfer a top non-red card with a or from your board to my board! If you do, draw and foreshadow a 6.
: Draw and foreshadow a 6.
html: Octant5
name: Octant

dogmas: : Draw and score a card of value equal to a bonus that occurs more than once on your board.
: You may splay your purple cards right.
: If you have six or more bonuses on your board, claim the Wealth achievement.
html: Palampore5
name: Palampore

dogmas: : If you have five top cards, each with a different value, return five cards from your score pile and then draw and score a card of each of your top cards' values in ascending order.
echoes: Draw a card of a value present in any player's hand.
html: Piano5
name: Piano

dogmas: : Return all cards from your hand. For each top card on your board with a bonus, draw a card of value equal to that bonus.
html: Pressure Cooker5
name: Pressure Cooker

dogmas: : I demand you return a top card from your board of value less than 3!
: Choose the 3, 4, or 5 deck. If there is at least one card in that deck, you may transfer its bottom card to the available achievements.
html: Seed Drill5
name: Seed Drill

dogmas: : Draw a tuck a 4. If your top card of the tucked card's color has value less than 4, draw and score a 4.
: You may splay your green cards right.
echoes: Score a top card from your board without a .
html: Stove5
name: Stove

dogmas: : Draw and meld a card of value one higher than the value of your top yellow card. If the melded card is yellow, repeat this dogma effect.
echoes: Meld your bottom green card.  Maintain its splay.
html: Thermometer5
name: Thermometer

dogmas: : Return a card from your hand. If you do, draw and reveal a card of the same value, and meld it if it is higher than a top card of the same color on your board. Otherwise, return it. You may repeat this dogma effect.
echoes: Look at the top card of any deck, then place it back on top.
html: Tuning Fork5
name: Tuning Fork

dogmas: : You may return a card from your forecast. If you do, draw and foreshadow a card of equal value to the card returned.
: You may splay your green cards right.
echoes: Draw and foreshadow a card of any value.
html: Bifocals6
name: Bifocals

dogmas: : Score the top two non-bottom cards of the color of the last card you tucked due to Dentures. If there are none to score, draw and tuck a 6, then repeat this dogma effect.
: You may splay your blue cards right.
echoes: Draw and tuck a 6.
html: Dentures6
name: Dentures

dogmas: : You may achieve (if eligible) a top card from any other player's board if they have an achievement of matching value. If you do, transfer your top green card to that player's board. Otherwise, draw and meld a 7.
echoes: Draw and score a 7.
html: Hot Air Balloon6
name: Hot Air Balloon

dogmas: : I demand you return two cards from your score pile.
: For every value of card you have in your score pile, score a card from your hand of that value.
html: Indian Clubs6
name: Indian Clubs

dogmas: : Draw and meld a 7. You may splay your cards of that color right.
html: Kaleidoscope6
name: Kaleidoscope

dogmas: : You may return two cards of different value from your score pile. If you do, draw and tuck three 6.
: If you have five or more visible on your board in one color, claim the Heritage achievement.
echoes: Score your lowest top card.
html: Loom6
name: Loom

dogmas: : I demand you return all odd-valued cards in your hand! Draw a 6!
: Draw a card of value one higher than the highest card returned due to the demand, if any were returned.
: You may splay your red cards right.
echoes: Score an odd-valued card from your hand.
html: Morphine6
name: Morphine

dogmas: : I demand you draw and tuck a 6! Transfer the top two cards of its color from your board to my score pile! Transfer the bottom card of its color from my board to your score pile!
html: Shrapnel6
name: Shrapnel

dogmas: : I demand you draw and reveal a 6! If it is blue or yellow, transfer it and all cards in your hand to my hand! If it is red or green, keep it and transfer two cards from your score pile to mine! If it is purple, keep it!
html: Steamboat6
name: Steamboat

dogmas: : Draw a 7. If you melded a blue card due to Stethoscope's echo effect, draw an 8.
: You may splay your yellow cards right.
echoes: Meld a blue or yellow card from your hand.
html: Stethoscope6
name: Stethoscope

dogmas: : Choose a value present in your score pile. Choose to transfer all cards of the chosen value from either all players' hands or all their score piles to your score pile.
echoes: Score your top or bottom green card.
html: Elevator7
name: Elevator

dogmas: : You may return a card from your hand. If you do, each player transfers a card from their score pile to their hand of value equal to the returned card (including you).
: Draw and foreshadow a card of any value.
html: Fertilizer7
name: Fertilizer

dogmas: : I demand you draw and meld a 1!
: Choose the 6, 7, 8, or 9 deck. If there is at least one card in that deck, you may transfer its bottom card to the available achievements.
echoes: Score a non-purple top card from your board without a bonus.
html: Ice Cream7
name: Ice Cream

dogmas: : Choose two different values less than 7. Draw and reveal a card of each value. Meld one, and return the other.
echoes: Draw two 9. Return one, foreshadow the other.
html: Jeans7
name: Jeans

dogmas: : I demand you transfer all of your top cards with a bonus to my score pile! If you transferred any, draw a 7!
: Return all your non-red top cards.
echoes: If you have five top cards, draw and score a 7.
html: Machine Gun7
name: Machine Gun

dogmas: : I demand you take the highest top card from your board into your hand!
: If you have at least three echo effects visible in one color, claim the History achievement.
echoes: Meld a card from your forecast.
html: Photography7
name: Photography

dogmas: : Score a top card from your board without a bonus.
: You may splay your red cards up.
echoes: Draw and tuck two 8.
html: Rubber7
name: Rubber

dogmas: : You may splay your purple cards up.
: If the for Bell, Flute, Piano, and Saxophone are visible anywhere, you win. Otherwise, draw a 7 for each that is visible.
html: Saxophone7
name: Saxophone

dogmas: : You may choose an opponent and a color. Match your splay in that color to theirs.
: You may splay your blue cards up.
html: Telegraph7
name: Telegraph

dogmas: : Return all cards from your hand. For each color of card returned, if any other player has a top card of that color higher than your top card of that color, draw two 7.
html: Typewriter7
name: Typewriter

dogmas: : I demand you return all cards from your score pile of value matching any of your top cards!
echoes: You may score a card from your hand.
html: Air Conditioner8
name: Air Conditioner

dogmas: : For each visible bonus on your board, draw a card of that value.
html: Crossword8
name: Crossword

dogmas: : I demand you return the highest card in your score pile for which you do not have a card of matching value in your hand! Return a top card from your board with a !
echoes: Meld a card from hand with a .
html: Bandage8
name: Bandage

dogmas: : Draw and tuck an 8 for every three on your board. If any of the tucked cards were green, repeat this dogma effect.
: You may splay your red cards up.
html: Nylon8
name: Nylon

dogmas: : For every two on your board, draw a 9. Meld one of the cards drawn and return the rest. If you meld A.I. due do this dogma effect, you win.
html: Radio Telescope8
name: Radio Telescope

dogmas: : I demand you transfer all cards without a from your hand to my hand!
html: Parachute8
name: Parachute

dogmas: : Return a card from your score pile. Draw and score two cards of value one less than the value of the card returned.
echoes: Return all cards from your hand and draw two 8.
html: Sliced Bread8
name: Sliced Bread

dogmas: : Choose a value and an opponent. Transfer a card of that value from their score pile to their board. If they have an achievement of the same value, achieve (if eligible) a card of that value from their score pile.
echoes: Draw and meld an 8.
html: Television8
name: Television

dogmas: : Draw and score a 7. Draw a 7.
echoes: Draw a 7.
html: Tractor8
name: Tractor

dogmas: : For every three on your board, draw and foreshadow a card of any value.
: You may splay your yellow cards up.
echoes: Draw and tuck an 8.
html: X-Ray8
name: X-Ray

dogmas: : I demand you transfer the highest top non-yellow card without a from your board to my board!
: You may splay your purple cards up.
echoes: Draw and score a card of any value.
html: ATM9
name: ATM

dogmas: : Score two bottom non-blue cards from your board. If you scored two and they have a total value less than 11, draw a card of that total value and repeat this dogma effect (once only).
: You may splay your blue cards up.
html: Calculator9
name: Calculator

dogmas: : You may take a top non-green card from your board into your hand. If you do, draw and score a card of equal value.
: You may splay your green cards up.
echoes: Draw and foreshadow a 9.
html: Credit Card9
name: Credit Card

dogmas: : Draw and foreshadow a 9.
: Execute all non-demand dogma effects on your lowest non-green top card. Do not share them.
echoes: Draw and foreshadow a 10.
html: Email9
name: Email

dogmas: : Transfer a top card other than Helicopter from any player's board to its owner's score pile. You may return a card from your hand which shares an icon with the transferred card. If you do, repeat this dogma effect.
html: Helicopter9
name: Helicopter

dogmas: : I demand you return your top card of the color I melded due to Jet's echo effect.
echoes: Meld a card from your hand.
html: Jet9
name: Jet

dogmas: : Execute all of the non-demand dogma effects of the card you melded due to Karaoke's echo effect. Do not share them.
: You may take a bottom card from your board into your hand.
echoes: Draw and meld a card of value less than 10.
html: Karaoke9
name: Karaoke

dogmas: : Return all unclaimed standard achievements. Then, return half (rounded up) of the cards in your score pile. Draw and meld two 10.
html: Laser9
name: Laser

dogmas: : I demand you transfer your top green card to my hand! If Scissors is your new top green card, I win!
: You may score a top card from your board. If Paper is your top green card, you win.
html: Rock9
name: Rock

dogmas: : For each visible bonus on your board, draw and tuck a card of that value, in ascending order.
echoes: Take a non-yellow top card from your board and tuck it.
html: Wristwatch9
name: Wristwatch

dogmas: : Claim one standard achievement, if eligible. Your current score is doubled for the purpose of checking eligibility.
html: Artificial Heart10
name: Artificial Heart

dogmas: : I demand you transfer all cards in your hand to my hand! Draw a 9!
: Meld all 9 from your hand. Return all other cards from your hand. Draw two 9.
html: Camcorder10
name: Camcorder

dogmas: : Draw a 10 for every two on your board.
: You may splay your green cards up.
: You may tuck any number of cards with a from your hand, splaying up each color you tucked into.
html: Cell Phone10
name: Cell Phone

dogmas: : I demand you return four cards from your score pile!
: Return a card from your score pile. If you do, you may splay any one color of your cards up.
html: Flash Drive10
name: Flash Drive

dogmas: : I demand you return all cards from your forecast!
: Draw and foreshadow three 10.
: You may splay your yellow cards up.
html: GPS10
name: GPS

dogmas: : You may draw and score a card of any value. Take a bottom card from your board into your hand. If the values of all the cards in your hand match the values of all the cards in your score pile exactly, you win.
html: Human Genome10
name: Human Genome

dogmas: : Return any number of cards from your hand. For each card returned, claim two standard achievements for which you are eligible.
: Draw and score a card of value equal to a bonus on your board.
html: MP310
name: MP3

dogmas: : You may score the bottom card or two bottom cards of one color from your board. If all the colors on your board contain the same number of visible cards (unsplayed = 1), you win.
html: Puzzle Cube10
name: Puzzle Cube

dogmas: : I demand you choose an icon type! Transfer all top cards without that icon from your board to my score pile!
: If you have fewer , fewer , and fewer than each other player, you win.
html: Social Networking10
name: Social Networking

dogmas: : Draw and meld a card of any value. If you have at least nine different bonus values visible on your board, you win. Execute each of the melded card's non-demand dogma effects. Do not share them.
html: Sudoku10
name: Sudoku

html: Expansion
name: Expansion
text: Splay any one of your colors up.

html: Trade
name: Trade
text:
Draw and foreshadow three cards of value one higher than your
    highest top card.

html: War
name: War
text:
Choose a value.  Return all top cards of that value from all
    other players' boards.

html: Rivalry
name: Rivalry
text:
Choose another player.  Return three cards from their score
    pile, and all their top figures.

html: Advancement
name: Advancement
text: Draw a card of value two higher than your highest top card.

echoes: Draw and foreshadow a 4.
html: Daedalus1
karmatext:
Each card in your forecast adds one to the value of your
  highest top card for the purpose of claiming achievements.
name: Daedalus

echoes: Draw and score a 2.
html: Fu Xi1
karmatext: You may issue a Trade Decree with any two figures. Each card in your score pile and forecast provides one additional .
name: Fu Xi

html: Gilgamesh1
inspire: Score a card from your hand.
karmatext: Each bonus on your board provides on additional for every top card on your board without a bonus.
name: Gilgamesh

html: Hammurabi1
inspire: Meld a card from your hand.
karmatext:
If a player would successfully demand something of you, first
  successfully demand that same thing of that player.
name: Hammurabi

html: Hatshepsut1
inspire: Draw a 1.
karmatext: If you would draw a card of value higher than 1 and you have a 1 in your hand, first return all cards from your hand and draw two cards of that value.
name: Hatshepsut

html: Homer1
inspire: Draw and tuck a 2.
karmatext:
If you would remove or return a figure from your hand, instead
  tuck it.
name: Homer

echoes: Draw a 2.
html: Huang Di1
karmatext: You may issue an Advancement Decree with any two figures. Each on your board provides one additional .
name: Huang Di

echoes: Draw and meld a 2.
html: Imhotep1
karmatext:
If you would meld a card over an unsplayed color with more than
  one card, instead splay that color left and return the card.
name: Imhotep

html: Ptahhotep1
inspire: Score a top card from your board.
karmatext:
If a player would successfully demand something of you, first
  transfer the lowest card from that player's score pile to your score
  pile.
name: Ptahhotep

html: Sargon of Akkad1
inspire: Draw and meld a 1.
karmatext:
If you would meld a card, and your current top card of that color
  is of equal or higher value, instead tuck it.
name: Sargon of Akkad

html: Shennong1
inspire: Draw and foreshadow a 2.
karmatext:
If you would foreshadow a card of the same value as a card in
  your forecast, first score each card of that value in your
  forecast.
name: Shennong

echoes: Draw and foreshadow a 2 or a 3.
html: Sinuhe1
karmatext: You may issue a Rivalry Decree with any two figures. Each on your board provides one additional point towards your score.
name: Sinuhe

html: Sneferu1
inspire: Draw and tuck a 2. If it has a , repeat this effect.
karmatext: You may issue an Expansion Decree with any two figures. Each on your board provides one additional .
name: Sneferu

html: Sunshu Ao1
inspire: Tuck a card from your hand.
karmatext:
If you would tuck a yellow card, instead execute all non-demand
  Dogma effects on it for yourself only, then return it to your hand.
name: Sunshu Ao

html: Tigernmas1
inspire: Draw a 1.
karmatext:
You may issue a War Decree with any two figures.  Each card in
  your hand provides one additional point toward your score.
name: Tigernmas

html: Alexander the Great2
inspire: Score a card from your hand.
karmatext: When you meld this card, score all opponents' top figures of value 1 or 2. If you would take a Dogma action, instead of using the featured icon use each player's current score.
name: Alexander the Great

echoes: Draw a 2.
html: Archimedes2
karmatext:
You may issue an Advancement Decree with any two figures.  If you
  would take a Dogma action, first increase every Age value in each
  echo and dogma effect by one.
name: Archimedes

html: Bi Sheng2
inspire: Draw and foreshadow a 4.
karmatext: If you would take a Dogma action and activate a card using a featured icon other than , instead tuck all cards from your forecast and use as the featured icon.
name: Bi Sheng

echoes: You may splay one color of your cards left.
html: Cai Lun2
karmatext: If you would claim an achievement, first draw and foreshadow a 3. Each card in your forecast counts as an available achievement for you.
name: Cai Lun

html: Confucius2
inspire: Score an opponent's top figure of value 1.
karmatext: If you would take a Dogma action and activate a card with a as a featured icon, instead choose any other icon on your board as the featured icon.
name: Confucius

html: Plato2
inspire: You may splay one color of your cards left.
karmatext: You may issue a Rivalry Decree with any two figures. Each splayed stack on your board provides one additional , , , and .
name: Plato

html: Ptolemy2
inspire: Draw and meld a 2.
karmatext:
You may issue a Trade Decree with any two figures.  Each top blue
  card on every player's board counts a card you can activate with a
  Dogma action.
name: Ptolemy

html: Sun Tzu2
inspire: Draw a 2.
karmatext:
You may issue a War Decree with any two figures.  If you would
  draw for a share bonus, first meld any number of cards from your
  hand matching the Dogma action's featured icon.
name: Sun Tzu

html: Ximen Bao2
inspire: Tuck a card from your hand.
karmatext:
You may issue an Expansion Decree with any two figures.  Each
  inspire and echo effect on your board counts as part of this stack.
  When executing, order them from bottom to top, red, blue, green,
  purple, yellow.
name: Ximen Bao

echoes: Draw and tuck a 3. Score all cards above it.
html: Zhang Heng2
karmatext:
Each card in your score pile counts as a bonus of its value on
  your board.
name: Zhang Heng

html: Al-Kindi3
inspire: Score a card from your hand.
karmatext:
If you would draw a card for sharing, first draw two cards of the
  same value.
name: Al-Kindi

echoes: Tuck a top card with from anywhere.
html: Alhazen3
karmatext: Each of your splayed colors counts as having a top card of value equal to the number of or in that color (whichever is higher) for the purpose of taking a Draw or Inspire action.
name: Alhazen

html: Avicenna3
inspire: Draw and tuck a 3.
karmatext:
You may issue an Expansion Decree with any two figures.  If you
  are required to fade a figure, instead do nothing.
name: Avicenna

html: Murasaki Shikibu3
inspire: Draw a 3.
karmatext:
You may issue a Rivalry Decree with any two figures.  If you
  would claim a standard achievement, instead achieve a card of equal
  value from your score pile.  Then claim the achievement, if you are
  still eligible.
name: Murasaki Shikibu

echoes: Draw and foreshadow a 3, 4, or 5.
html: Rhazes3
karmatext:
If you would draw a card, first tuck a card of the same value
  from your hand.
name: Rhazes

echoes: Score any other top card with from anywhere.
html: Saladin3
karmatext:
You may issue a War Decree with any two figures.  If you would
  score a nonfigure card, instead meld the card, then you may splay
  left the color of that card.
name: Saladin

echoes: Draw and meld a 4.
html: Sejong the Great3
karmatext: You may issue an Advancement Degree with any two figures. If you would meld a blue card of value above 3, instead return it and draw and meld a card of value one higher.
name: Sejong the Great

html: Shen Kuo3
inspire: You may splay one color of your cards left.
karmatext:
Each splayed color on your board provides three additional points
  towards your score.
name: Shen Kuo

html: Su Song3
inspire: Draw and meld a 3. If it has a , repeat this effect.
karmatext: You may issue a Trade Decree with any two figures. If you would draw a 3, first transfer a card from your score pile to your forecast.
name: Su Song

echoes: Score a top red card of value less than 4 from anywhere.
html: Tran Huang Dao3
karmatext: Each two on your board provides one additional icon of every other type on your board.
name: Tran Huang Dao

html: Amina Sukhera4
inspire: Score all bottom purple cards.
karmatext: When you meld this card, score all opponents' top figures of value 4. Each top card with a on your board counts as an available achievement for you.
name: Amina Sukhera

html: C. Columbus4
inspire: Draw a 4.
karmatext: You may issue a Trade Decree with any two figures. Each on your board provides two additional .
name: C. Columbus

echoes: Draw and foreshadow a 5 or 6.
html: Galileo Galilei4
karmatext:
If you would foreshadow a card of value not present in your
  forecast, first transfer all cards from your forecast into your
  hand.
name: Galileo Galilei

echoes: Draw a 5.
html: Johannes Kepler4
karmatext:
If you would take a Dogma action, first reveal all cards of the
  chosen card's color from your hand.  Increase each Age value in any
  effect during this action by the number of cards you revealed.
name: Johannes Kepler

echoes: Score a top figure with a bonus from anywhere.
html: Leonardo da Vinci4
karmatext: If you would meld a yellow card, first meld every non-yellow, non-purple card in your hand. If you would meld a purple card, first draw three 4.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

html: Michelangelo4
inspire: Score a card from your hand.
karmatext: Each card in your hand is also considered part of your score pile.
name: Michelangelo

echoes: Splay one color right that you have splayed left.
html: Niccolo Machiavelli4
karmatext:
Each color splayed right on your board but not splayed in any
  direction on any other player's board counts as an achievement.
name: Niccolo Machiavelli

html: Takiyuddin4
inspire: Draw and tuck a 5. If it has a , meld it instead.
karmatext:
You may issue an Advancement Decree with any two figures.  If you
  would take an Inspire action, first you may splay that color
  right.
name: Takiyuddin

html: William Shakespeare4
inspire: Meld a card from your hand.
karmatext: You may issue a Rivalry Decree with any two figures. Each on your board provides one additional point toward your score.
name: William Shakespeare

echoes: Score a top card with from anywhere.
html: Yi Sun-sin4
karmatext: If you would score a card of a color you have splayed, instead tuck it, then draw and tuck a 3.
name: Yi Sun-sin

echoes: Draw a 6.
html: A. van Leeuwenhoek5
karmatext:
Each card in hand counts as ten points towards the cost of
  claiming an achievement of that card's value.
name: A. van Leeuwenhoek

html: Bartholomew Roberts5
inspire: Score a top card with from anywhere.
karmatext:
If you would score a card, first claim an achievement matching
  that card's value, ignoring the age requirement.
name: Bartholomew Roberts

html: Bartolomeo Cristofori5
inspire: Meld a card from your hand.
karmatext:
If you would meld the fifth visible card of a color on your
  board, first claim an achievement ignoring the score restriction.
name: Bartolomeo Cristofori

echoes: Draw and foreshadow a 7, 8, 9, or 10.
html: Christian Huygens5
karmatext: If you would foreshadow a card, instead meld it if it both has a and its value is no more than two higher than your highest top card. Otherwise, foreshadow it.
name: Christian Huygens

html: Christopher Polhem5
inspire: Draw and tuck a 4.
karmatext: You may issue an Expansion Decree with any two figures. Each on your board provides two additional points towards your score.
name: Christopher Polhem

echoes: Splay one color of your cards right.
html: Isaac Newton5
karmatext: If you would take a Draw or Inspire action, first draw a 1 and transfer it to the board of a player with the fewest visible cards of that color on their board.
name: Isaac Newton

html: Johannes Vermeer5
inspire: Draw and score a 3.
karmatext:
If you would claim a standard achievement, first claim an
  achievement of value one higher, regardless of eligibility.
name: Johannes Vermeer

html: Peter the Great5
inspire: Tuck a card from your hand.
karmatext: When you meld this card, return all opponents' top figures. If you would tuck a card with a , first achieve your bottom green card, if eligible. Otherwise, score it.
name: Peter the Great

html: S. de Champlain5
inspire: Return a 5 from your hand. Draw a 6.
karmatext:
If you would draw a fifth card into your hand, first claim an
  achievement of that card's value or below, regardless of
  eligibility.
name: S. de Champlain

echoes:
Transfer one of your top cards to the available
    achievements.
html: Shivaji5
karmatext:
You may issue a War Decree with any two figures.  If an opponent
  would claim an achievement, first you claim it if eligible.
name: Shivaji

html: Adam Smith6
inspire: You may splay one color of your cards right.
karmatext: Each on your board provides two additional .
name: Adam Smith

echoes:
Take a top figure into your hand from any player's board.  Meld
    it.
html: Benjamin Franklin6
karmatext:
You may issue an Advancement Decree with any two figures.  If you
  would meld a card, first draw and meld a card of one higher
  value.
name: Benjamin Franklin

echoes: Draw a 7.
html: Carl Friedrich Gauss6
karmatext:
If you would meld a card, first choose a value and meld all cards
  of that value from your hand and score pile.
name: Carl Friedrich Gauss

html: Catherine the Great6
inspire: Draw and meld a 6.
karmatext: Each on your board provides two additional . If you would meld a purple card, first transfer your top purple card into your hand.
name: Catherine the Great

html: Edward Jenner6
inspire: Tuck a card from your hand.
karmatext:
If a player would successfully demand something of you, instead
  return a card from your hand.
name: Edward Jenner

html: John Harrison6
inspire: Draw a 6.
karmatext: You may issue a Trade Decree with any two figures. If an opponent would draw a card for sharing, first draw a 6. You may choose the type of card drawn.
name: John Harrison

html: John L. McAdam6
inspire: Meld a card from your hand.
karmatext: You may issue an Expansion Decree with any two figures. Each top card with a on your board counts as an available achievement for you.
name: John L. McAdam

html: L. van Beethoven6
inspire: Score a card from your hand.
karmatext: You may issue a Rivalry Decree with any two figures. If you would score a card with a , first return all cards from your score pile, then draw and score four 5.
name: L. van Beethoven

echoes: Score a top figure of value 5 or 6 from anywhere.
html: Napoleon Bonaparte6
karmatext: You may issue a War Decree with any two figures. If you would score or return a card with a , instead tuck it and score a top card of value 6 from anywhere.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

echoes: Draw and tuck a 6.
html: Tecumseh6
karmatext: If you would tuck a card with a , first return a top card with a from another player's board.
name: Tecumseh

html: Alfred Nobel7
inspire: Score a card from your hand.
karmatext:
Each icon type on your board counts as an achievement, if you
  have at least twice as many of that icon as every other player.
name: Alfred Nobel

echoes: Draw an 8.
html: Charles Darwin7
karmatext:
You may issue an Advancement Decree with any two figures.  If you
  would claim an achievement, first if no other player has as many or
  more achievements as you, instead you win.
name: Charles Darwin

html: Emperor Meiji7
inspire: Draw and foreshadow an 8 or 9.
karmatext: If you would meld a card of value 10 and you have top cards of values 9 and 8 on your board, instead you win. Each card in your forecast counts as being in your hand.
name: Emperor Meiji

html: Florence Nightingale7
inspire: Tuck a card from your hand.
karmatext:
You may issue and Expansion Decree with any two figures.  If an
  opponent's effect would transfer, return, or remove a card from your
  score pile, instead leave it there.
name: Florence Nightingale

echoes: You may splay up a color you have splayed right.
html: George Stephenson7
karmatext: If you would claim an achievement, first transfer the bottom card from each nonempty age below 10 to the available achievements.
name: George Stephenson

html: James Clerk Maxwell7
inspire: Draw an 8.
karmatext:
Each card in hand provides an additional icon of every type on
  your board.
name: James Clerk Maxwell

html: John Ericsson7
inspire: Draw and tuck a 7.
karmatext: When you meld this card, score all opponents' top figures of value less than 7. Each on your board provides an additional .
name: John Ericsson

echoes: Transfer a figure from any score pile to yours.
html: Queen Victoria7
karmatext:
You may issue a Rivalry Decree with any two figures.  If you
  would claim a standard achievement, first make an achievement
  available from any lower nonempty age.
name: Queen Victoria

echoes: Transfer a top card with from anywhere to any player's board.
html: Robert E. Lee7
karmatext: You may issue a War Decree with any two figures. Each seven on your board counts as an achievement.
name: Robert E. Lee

html: Rowland Hill7
inspire: Draw a 7.
karmatext:
If you would claim an achievement, first return three cards from
  your hand.  If you do, claim all other cards in your hand as
  achievements, ignoring eligibility.
name: Rowland Hill

echoes: Meld all cards from your hand with or .
html: Albert Einstein8
karmatext: You may issue an Advancement Decree with any two figures. Each Age value in any of your effects counts as a 10.
name: Albert Einstein

html: Caresse Crosby8
inspire: Tuck a card from your hand.
karmatext:
If you would tuck a card with a , first splay that color of your cards left, then draw two 2.
If you would splay a fifth color left, instead you win.
name: Caresse Crosby

html: Duke Ellington8
inspire: Draw and meld an 8 figure.
karmatext:
If you are required to fade a figure, instead do nothing.  If you
  would meld a figure and have four top figures already, instead
  achieve it regardless of eligibility.
name: Duke Ellington

html: Emmy Noether8
inspire: Draw and meld an 8.
karmatext: Each on your board provides an additional number of points equal to the number of on your board.
name: Emmy Noether

echoes: Transfer a card from any score pile to yours.
html: Erwin Rommel8
karmatext:
You may issue a War Decree with any two figures.  If you would
  score a card, first score the top card of its color from all
  boards.
name: Erwin Rommel

html: H.G. Wells8
inspire: Draw and foreshadow a 10.
karmatext:
If you would foreshadow a card, instead meld it, execute its
  nondemand Dogma effects for yourself only, and remove it from the
  game if it is still a top card on your board.
name: H.G. Wells

echoes: You may splay one color of your cards up.
html: J.P. Morgan8
karmatext:
You may issue a Trade Decree with any two figures.  Each icon in
  each color you have splayed up provides an additional icon of the
  same type.
name: J.P. Morgan

echoes: Draw and reveal two 9. If either is purple, return them.
html: John von Neumann8
karmatext: When you meld this card, return all opponents' top figures. Each card in your hand provides two additional .
name: John von Neumann

echoes: Draw a 9.
html: Marie Curie8
karmatext: Each different value present in your score pile above 6 counts as an achievement.
name: Marie Curie

html: Nikola Tesla8
inspire: Draw a 9.
karmatext: You may issue an Expansion Decree with any two figures. If you would meld a card with a or , first score an opponent's top card with neither nor .
name: Nikola Tesla

echoes: Draw and score a 9.
html: Che Guevara9
karmatext:
When you meld this card, score all opponents' top figures.  If
  you would score a green card, instead remove it and all cards in all
  score piles from the game.
name: Che Guevara

echoes: Meld a top purple card from anywhere.
html: Gene Roddenberry9
karmatext:
If you would meld a purple card, instead if it is Enterprise, you
  win.  Otherwise, tuck the card and return any top figure.
name: Gene Roddenberry

html: Grace Hopper9
inspire: Tuck two cards from your hand.
karmatext: If another player would not draw a card for sharing after a Dogma action, first draw a 10.
name: Grace Hopper

echoes: You may splay one color of your cards up.
html: Hedy Lamarr9
karmatext:
You may issue a Trade Decree with any two figures.  Each special
  achievement is claimed with one fewer or one lower of each
  requirement listed for you.
name: Hedy Lamarr

html: Mikhail Kalashnikov9
inspire: Tuck a card from your hand.
karmatext:
If you would tuck a red card, instead choose a top red card on
  an opponent's board.  Either transfer it to your score pile, or
  execute its nondemand Dogma effects for yourself only.
name: Mikhail Kalashnikov

html: Nelson Mandela9
inspire: Draw and meld a 9.
karmatext:
If you are required to fade a figure, instead do nothing.  Each
  two inspire effects visible on your board counts as an
  achievement.
name: Nelson Mandela

html: Pele9
inspire: Draw and tuck three 9.
karmatext:
You may issue a Rivalry Decree with any two figures.  If you
  would tuck a yellow card after tucking a green card in the same
  turn, instead you win.
name: Pele

html: Ruth Handler9
inspire: Transfer a top card from your board to your hand.
karmatext: If you would meld a card, first meld all other cards of that color from your hand, then draw and score a 9 for each card you melded in this way.
name: Ruth Handler

echoes: Draw a 10.
html: Taiichi Ohno9
karmatext:
If you would take a Dogma action and activate a card, first
  achieve a card from your hand with featured icon matching that
  card's featured icon, regardless of eligibility.
name: Taiichi Ohno

html: Wernher von Braun9
inspire: Draw and foreshadow a 10.
karmatext: Each card in your forecast counts as being in your score pile.
name: Wernher von Braun

html: Alex Trebek10
inspire: Draw and meld a card of any value.
karmatext:
If you would draw a card and have no figures of that value in
  hand, first say "Who is" and name a figure.  Search the figures deck
  of that age for the named figure and take it into hand if present.
  Then shuffle that deck.
name: Alex Trebek

html: Jackie Chan10
inspire: Score a card from your hand.
karmatext:
If an opponent would win, first score all other top figures in
  play.  If you now have the most points, you win instead.
name: Jackie Chan

echoes: Score a top card from your board.
html: Kim Yu-Na10
karmatext: If you would score a card with a , instead you win.
name: Kim Yu-Na

echoes: Score a top card with a or .
html: Margaret Thatcher10
karmatext: If you would take a Dogma action, first score any top card with a or from anywhere.
name: Margaret Thatcher

echoes: Draw and meld a 10.
html: Martin Scorcese10
karmatext:
If you would meld a figure, instead tuck the figure and claim a
  standard achievement, regardless of eligibility.
name: Martin Scorcese

html: Muhammad Yunus10
inspire: Draw a 10.
karmatext:
If any player would take a Dogma action, first you may return a
  card.  If you do, you have the sole majority in its featured icon
  until the end of the action.
name: Muhammad Yunus

html: Sergey Brin10
inspire: You may splay one color of your cards up.
karmatext:
Each top card on every player's board counts as a card you can
  activate with a Dogma action.
name: Sergey Brin

echoes: Draw a 10. If it does not have , score it.
html: Shigeru Miyamoto10
karmatext: If you would take a Dogma action and activate a card using as the featured icon, first if you have exactly one, three, or six on your board, you win.
name: Shigeru Miyamoto

html: Stephen Hawking10
inspire: Draw and tuck a 10.
karmatext: Each on your board also counts as an echo effect reading "Score the bottom card in this color."
name: Stephen Hawking

html: Susan Blackmore10
inspire: Execute any echo or inspire effect.
karmatext:
If another player would not draw a share bonus after a Dogma
  action, first transfer the card they activated to your score
  pile.
name: Susan Blackmore

html: Glory
name: Glory
text: Claim this special achievement immediately if you have a white flag that counts as an achievement.

html: Victory
name: Victory
text: Claim this special achievement immediately if you have a visible black flag.

html: Legend
name: Legend
text: Claim this special achievement immediately if you splay a stack left due to an arrow icon.

html: Repute
name: Repute
text: Claim this special achievement immediately if you splay a stack right due to an arrow icon.

html: Fame
name: Fame
text: Claim this special achievement immediately if you splay a stack up due to an arrow icon.
